original: 該據點當前的幕僚武將，影響據點的發展，<color=#FFE9D6>智力</color>影響據點平均發展、<color=#FFE9D6>務農</color>能力影響<color=#FFE9D6>農業值</color>發展、<color=#FFE9D6>經商</color>能力影響<color=#FFE9D6>商業值</color>發展、<color=#FFE9D6>技工</color>能力影響<color=#FFE9D6>技術值</color>發展。
text: The current staff and generals of the base affect the development of the base, <color=#FFE9D6>Int</color> affects the average development of the base, <color=#FFE9D6> farming</color> affects the ability of <color=#FFE9D6> agriculture Value</color> development, <color=#FFE9D6>doing business</color> ability influence<color=#FFE9D6>commercial value</color> development, <color=#FFE9D6>technician</color> ability influence<color=#FFE9D6>Technical value</color> development.
